concept-wr.title: Swift Dimensioning for Storage Nodes
concept-wr.shortdesc: Swift storage is not based on VMs but on the total number and size of the objects to be stored.

conbody.p: To determine the disk capacity requirement for the Swift object pool, calculate the total storage for Swift objects required to be supported plus some margin to handle growth.

sl.sli: Swift Storage Requirement = N * AvgObjectSize + Margin
N = Total number of volumes required
AvgObjectSize = Average size of swift objects on disk in GB
Margin = User-defined margin (recommend at least 25%, possibly more for object storage)
